    • Constructor Detail

      • ParametersChromosome

        public ParametersChromosome(double mutationRate,
                            double recombinationRate,
                            int chromosomeLength,
                            MutationList mutationList)
        Create a new ParametersChromosome
        Parameters:
        mutationRate - is the mutation rate of the region
        recombinationRate - is the recombination rate of the region
        chromosomeLength - is the chromosome length in bp
        mutationList - is the mutation list that will keep track on the mutations present in the region

      • ParametersChromosome

        public ParametersChromosome(int chromosomeLength,
                            MutationList mutationList)
        Create a new ParametersChromosome
        Parameters:
        chromosomeLength - is the chromosome length
        mutationList - is the mutation list with the mutations present in the region
